name: Concept Dungeon
description:
This is a submission for Wowie Jam 3.0

In this game you will run around with a sword and shield that automatically rotate around you. Use the sword to attack enemies, and use the shield to defend yourself. If you die, you will be respawned at a random checkpoint (hence the jam's theme, failure is progress). This game is just a proof of concept, so don't expect anything too fancy!
